detailed_info.name: Sodium hydroxide
detailed_info.description: Caustic soda is used in the preparation of many products (detergents, explosives ...). It is used to make sodium salts and to neutralize acids. In cosmetics, it allows the manufacture of solid soaps. Caustic soda is allowed in organic, it does not pose problems in the conditions of regulation.
detailed_info.regulation:
The maximum amount of sodium hydroxide to be used in cosmetics is limited as follows:
a) Solvent nail cuticles: 5%.

b) Hair straightening products: 2% for general use and 4.5% for professional use.

c) pH regulator for depilatories: pH <12.7.

d) Other uses as pH regulator: pH <11.

Wording of conditions of employment and warnings:
a) Contains an alkaline agent
Avoid contact with the eyes
Danger of blindness
Keep out of reach of children
